nodes.text: A gas cloud nebula was located in the galaxy. The nebula caused all starships to lose power for communications, sensors and navigation systems. At some point during the New Republic Era, the Duros pilot Staaysha Dekkr got lost inside the gas cloud, Dekkr was later rescued by Resistance pilot Tallissan Lintra who was conducting a training excersice near the nebula when she heard the distress signal.
